newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Gang hit kills six in Moscow.
newsitem.headline: Gang hit kills six in Moscow.

text.p: Six men were found shot dead at a Russian government building in Moscow on Wednesday in what police said was a settling of accounts between mafia-type gangs.
The six were all ethnic Azeris aged between 25 and 30, and none of them worked at the scene of the crime, a communications centre for the merchant fleet.

Police said they had a lead on the killers and were confident of making arrests. Many similiar brutal murders have gone unsolved in recent years as crime has spiralled following the collapse of Soviet communism.
